member.name: T:System.Windows.Resources.StreamResourceInfo
member.summary: Stores information for a stream resource used in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF), such as images.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Resources.StreamResourceInfo.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Resources.StreamResourceInfo.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on a provided stream.
member.param: The Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) content type of the stream.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Resources.StreamResourceInfo.Stream
member.summary: Gets or sets the actual stream of the resource.
